title: The New Champion
body: Is it gonna be Ao Shin or someone else? quite curious bout this one. tell me what u guys think?!

replies.body: There is some questions whether it is gonna be someone named Bard. in the lore that was posted on the website said at the very end that the person in the stories' name is Bard....... :O
It didn't specify a name, it just said they were a bard. Their name may be 'Bard' but that is not confirmed.
it's not %%%%ing ao shin, he won't be coming out for ages

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=W8AFaE7T,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-21T12:38:38.946+0000)
>
> it's not %%%%ing ao shin, he won't be coming out for ages

This. So many stupid people expecting Ao Shin.
Its not going to be Ao Shin. Riot says its going to be a long time before Ao Shin is released
Most likely someone else. There's pretty much nothing linking what we know of Ao Shin and the champ preview.
Not Ao Shin but he will be soon I think
